welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rendon, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at DFW, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, with a wide variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at DFW, primarily serving American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, serving international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to two hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
